title: HOW DO I FIX THIS?????
body: It only seems to happen when I'm in a draft or ranked game, but the second I get into champ select an error pops up that reads. "Failed To Create Dumpfile" and my league stops working. I'm getting very frustrated having to wait for dodging q's when in all reality I'm not trying to. I would really love an answer as to how to fix this b4 I get banned for dodging to many times. And yes I have tried to delete and redownload the game. New bug?

replies.body: Uninstalling the game wont remove or fix settings/registry, try to run the repair tool. Also run the game as administrator/superuser.

I have tried each of these methods and nothing seems to work. I am also playing on a new computer, but when I get into a champ select don't choose my champion cuz ive instantly been kicked out due to this issue you'd think riot would question what is going on b4 throwing a 15 minute wait timer on me for me and my friends to suffer through who are also aware of this reoccurring issue. This is really upsetting my gameplay, I will try the repair tool and see how things go. Next time ill be uploading photos of this "bug"

All the server can see is that you disconnected, and all the client can do is give a bug report.

The server cant trust the client to tell it that you disconnected due to situations beyond your control - if it did, every kiddie hacker would just spoof it to freely disconnect without any penalties whenever they want.
